content: beautiful simple and elegant dolce classical attitude shawl 1 crocheted in dolce cashmere 2 which is an incredibly soft and amazing wool blend accompanied by a pretty and delicate cashmere the color play of dolce cashmere 3 is something quite special since the colors slowly change throughout the entire skein the shawl is crocheted in a simple pattern and it gives a beautiful and elegant result happy crocheting materials - hobbii dolce cashmere 4 - crochet hook g 4 0mm finished size ca 61 x 25 inch gauge 20 sts x 11 row = 4 x 4 yarn requirement 1 skein hobbii dolce cashmere 5 abbreviations **chain** chain **st** stitch **single_crochet** single_crochet **half_double_crochet** half_double_crochet **double_crochet** double_crochet **treble_crochet** treble_crochet **chain-space** chain space info the chain 4 at the beginning of every row counts as 1 treble_crochet 1 https //hobbii com/dolce-classical-attitude-shawl utm_medium=social&utm_source=ravelry&utm_campaign=pattern&utm_content=dolce-classical-attitude-shawl&utm_term=swr 2 https //hobbii com/dolce-cashmere utm_medium=social&utm_source=ravelry&utm_campaign=product&utm_content=dolce-cashmere&utm_term=swr 3 https //hobbii com/dolce-cashmere utm_medium=social&utm_source=ravelry&utm_campaign=product&utm_content=dolce-cashmere&utm_term=swr 4 https //hobbii com/dolce-cashmere utm_medium=social&utm_source=ravelry&utm_campaign=product&utm_content=dolce-cashmere&utm_term=swr 5 https //hobbii com/dolce-cashmere utm_medium=social&utm_source=ravelry&utm_campaign=product&utm_content=dolce-cashmere&utm_term=swr
